6 void printmemusage(){
7  pid_t pid=getpid();
8  char procfilename[1000];
9  sprintf(procfilename, "/proc/%d/status", pid);
10  ifstream is(procfilename);
11  string line;
12  while (is){
13  is >> line;
14  if (line=="VmData:"){
15  is >> line;
16  cerr << "#VmData:\t" << line << endl;
17  }

19  is >> line;
